Detailed Description

Interface for the POSIX memory management.

Note:
This interface exists usually as a singleton as superclass of L4Re::Vfs::Ops.

An implementation for this interface is in l4/l4re_vfs/impl/vfs_impl.h and used by the l4re_vfs library or by the VFS implementation in lsdo.
